name: Bingo Now
description:
This is the most exciting bingo game. Try to complete the bingo patterns, and you can play bingo slots!

Let’s see what you can experience in this bingo journey.

Features
- Classic bingo game which is easy to learn and play.
- Earn rewards by daubing correctly.
- Trigger bingo slots by completing bingo patterns.
- Use power-ups to get more rewards or bingo more easily.

Bingo Patterns
- Straight Line Across
- Straight Line Down
- Diagonal
- Four Corners

Power-ups
- Triple Square: Triple some rewards in the squares.
- Coin Squares: Add rewards in some empty squares.
- Daub: Randomly daub the square on the card.

Now Download Bingo Now and Play Bingo Game Right Now!
